Hi,

we already have an "angle snap" option for construction, this allows things to be perfectly aligned lonitudinally, but we do not have a "vertical snap" which means it is hard to align objects vertically.

I for one would like this feature.

RBS.

We do have one, incidentally. It's just not available from in-game. You can enable/disable it in the settings.cfg file. It's presently quite useless, and only snaps things to a halfway point on the part you attach to.
